Templ8

Welcome to Templ8, a tool for developers

Click on a feature to add it.

<!DOCTYPE html>

  <html lang="en">
  <head>

    <!--META TAGS HERE-->
    <meta charset="utf-8">

    <title>YOUR TITLE HERE</title>
    <meta name="description" content="The HTML5 Herald">
    <meta name="author" content="SitePoint">

    <!--LINKS GO HERE-->
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="css/styles.css?v=1.0">
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/3.3.7/css/bootstrap.min.css=1.0"
    integrity="sha384-BVYiiSIFeK1dGmJRAkycuHAHRg32OmUcww7on3RYdg4Va+PmSTsz/K68vbdEjh4u=1.0"crossorigin="anonymous=1.0">
    <!--[if lt IE 9]>
      <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/html5shiv/3.7.3/html5shiv.js"></script>
    <![endif]-->

  </head>
  <body>

    <!--SCRIPT LIBRARIES AND FILE LINKS-->
    <script src="https://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/3.1.0/jquery.min.js"></script>
    <script src="https://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jqueryui/1.11.4/jquery-ui.min.js"></script>
    <script src="https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/3.3.7/js/bootstrap.min.js"></script>
    <script src="js/scripts.js"></script>

  </body>
  </html>

What is

Templ8?

Templ8 is a Developer tool to help cut down on the tetious task of writing your HTML, getting the CDN's and then arranging them properly so as that everything works. This tool was created in mind with not only saving you time when creating a new webpage from scratch but also to cut down on errors and debugging your HTML...which you should never have to do. Right now Templ8 is in beta but it's pretty sturdy to use as your daily go to HTML framer (That's what we're calling it). In the future we'd like to add more CDN's and customizablility but for now we've included a "Paste your own CDN" for some of those rarer libraries. If you want to give us some feedback or insight into things we can do differently email me at JohnECossack@gmail.com. Thanks for checking templ8 out. Enjoy!
